infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to show available delivery options, calculate delivery times, and ensure your order reaches you accurately.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We need your location to ensure timely delivery updates even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Your location will help us provide the best delivery experience, including background tracking if needed.
